Package org.mbild.mbwatch

Class WatchBase

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.Group
org.mbild.mbwatch.WatchBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
RTClock
public class WatchBase extends javafx.scene.Group implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
Class representing a simple, basic clock without any real-time functions.
Author:
Matthias Bild
